mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking_records (booking_id, member_id, class_id, booking_time, status, attended) VALUES (#{bookingId}, #{memberId}, #{classId}, NOW(), #{status}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT booking_id AS bookingId, member_id AS memberId, class_id AS classId, booking_time AS bookingDate, status, attended, attended_time AS attendedTime FROM booking_records WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY booking_time DESC

SELECT booking_id AS bookingId, member_id AS memberId, class_id AS classId, booking_time AS bookingDate, status, attended, attended_time AS attendedTime FROM booking_records WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND class_id = #{classId} ORDER BY booking_time DESC LIMIT 1
